data.text:
@HipposinTutus The same people that called me a conspiracy nut for intially being concerned, called me a nut again when I realized it wasn't the end of the world

Can't win lol

@0Fedbear2 Lady I took the train with's son is in the AF, she told me in December some hinky stuff was going on & her son told her stuff was happening in China and shit was about to get bad.  That some virus got out of a lab, I told people I knew then, no one believed me either...

@0Fedbear2 i knew about it right at the start of the January 
laowhy86  was spreading the word he also found the connection to the lab in April of that year too. he's really good with getting news out of china.

@Adam55269595 I remember seeing the first articles come out in December when everyone was uppity about WW3 over Iran. @Styx666Official covered it from the start. I was straight chillin when the shortages first came lol

@0Fedbear2 Follow a couple of guys on YouTube. Laway86 and SerpentZ I think are their names. ADVChina is their shared channel. I knew about it in December 2019. Warned everyone I knew to prepare...no one took me seriously. 🤷‍♂️
